name: AC CAMERFIMA SA
goal: AC Camerfirma is a Spanish Qualifed Trust Service Provider, located in Madrid, who is leading Certification Authority in the Iberian Region with extension to LATAM Countries. It’s owned by InfoCert, S.p.A. (Italian Qualified Trust Service Provider) and the Spanish Chambers of Commerce. Its main activities, both in public and private sectors are: electronic signature, electronic seal, time stamp, website authentication, e-delivery, and solutions for these products
euInitiatives:
1-Normativa que se desarrolle en base al reglamento eIDAS

2- Normas ETSI

3- Normas CABForum
